OOC Logo we'v got to do something about our timing, I was writing the 
post while you sent yours, great minds do think alike.

BIC Images of Shadow Wing went through Lunarpines head like a Wild 
Fire, he could feal her presence, hear her thoughts, even it seemed, 
smell her soft feathers.

"Wing? what happened to me? You're here, I'm so glad to see you." he 
regained his composure "I mean it's good to see you're still 
functioning."

His memory flashed back in time He could see Serpentor kicking her 
unmoving body, he could feal his own claws slashing himself in order 
to save her, all his memories collected until the moment Veratis 
crossed him. Lunarpine had sworn to protect Shadow Wings spark and 
here he was nonfunctional he fealt he'd failed her again.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> :ShadowWing::
> 
> While he is in stasis lock, she can communicate to him, "Hello 
there. 
> I have missed you."  sending a warn feeling to him.  Her spark 
still 
> beating in him, waiting for a new body.     
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Meanwhile back in the cold climate of future Norway
> > 
> > Lunarpine didn't like the smell of his situation. Veratis was a 
> week 
> > old bot who didn't seem to pose much of a threat but that's when 
> > things have been hitting him lately. 
> > 
> > Both bots remained silent for a long time before the silence was 
> > finally broken by Veratis. "You seem tired my friend, how long 
has 
> it 
> > been since you recharged?" The scientist seemed naturally worried 
> > about his guest but he had other things on his mind as well.
> > 
> > Lunarpine couldn't understand Veratis's hospitality but his host 
> had 
> > yet to give him any reason to deny his problems. "It's been a 
> while, 
> > I think that It's been a day or so. I could be wrong."
> > 
> > "Then you must rest my new friend." Veratis' grin showed no more 
> than 
> > a lonely bot looking for company. "Sit right here and I'll be 
right 
> > back." The host left the room with a seemingly anxious manner.
> > 
> > Lunarpine knew that all this hospitality wasn't because of his 
> hosts  
> > need for company. His wolf senses told him there were two others 
> > accompanying Veratis, thier scents were week so it'd been some 
time 
> > since thier departure. Still he didn't want to seem an ungrateful 
> > guest so he decided to play along for now.
> > 
> > Veratis returned carrying a tray with old style energeon cubes, 
He 
> > placed the tray between them and picked up two. He handed one to 
> > Lunarpine and held one up to himself. "You still don't trust me? 
> well 
> > then a toast, To the earning of trust." he then raised the cube 
to 
> > his mettalic lips and drained it dry.
> > 
> > The cube handed to Lunarpine didn't smell right, it had a 
distinct 
> > scent added to it. He set it back on the tray and picked up 
another 
> > one. this one smelled different, it was pure energeon, at least 
it 
> > smelled pure. The wolf tipped his head back, looking at Veratis 
the 
> > whole way. "Ya to earning trust." He too sucked the energeon dry. 
> It 
> > fealt reinviggorating to recharge. He tried to stand, to feal the 
> > energy returning to his body. That was his second mistake. The 
> > wolfbot collapsed to the floor, going into stasis lock.
